library(knitr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  root.dir = normalizePath('./'),
  cache = TRUE,

  dev = c('png', 'pdf'),

  knitr.table.format = 'html',
  # Code block options
  eval = TRUE,
  include = TRUE,
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  results = 'asis',
  error = TRUE
)
